    WORK EXPERIENCE

    Schneider Electric, Bangalore, India Jul 2016 – Jul 2019

    Data Analyst

    Mar 2018 – Jul 2019

    • Statistical Modelling - Saved 20% in workload expenses by forecasting call volume using time-series modeling ARIMA, exponential-smoothing methods using SAS and R
    • Business Intelligence - Recommended solutions by performing advanced data analytics on Power BI and Tableau improving promoter score by 2 points
    • Data Visualization - Created dashboards to showcase insights on customer experience achieving a 20% increase in retention
    • Database Management – Optimized SQL scripts performing ETL operations on raw call logs data for reporting and analysis while ensuring data integrity
    • Cloud Migration - Served as the main point of contact for the deployment of Genesys applications on AWS cloud with zero downtime

    Technical Analyst

    Jul 2016 – Feb 2018

    • Designed and published 10 different call center analytics dashboards on Tableau tracking KPIs and trends from Genesys data repositories
    • Worked closely with the business teams to fill knowledge gaps about terminologies in data and analysis findings

    ACADEMIC PROJECTS

    Customer Churn Prediction
    Nov 2020 – Dec 2020

    • Consolidated data from 5 different sources by automating it with Apache Airflow scripts saving a manual effort of 4+ hours
    • Hypothesized and derived a statistical model that predicts customer churn using temporal and accounting attributes
    • Presented data-driven business insights for a 40% potential reduction in churn using predictive analytics in R
    • Improved the prediction model to predict customer satisfaction score to an accuracy of 95% from a baseline 83%
    • Formulated customer cohorts based on age-period technique with an 80% chance of customer retention

    TECHNICAL SKILLS & CERTIFICATIONS
